Class Application

java.lang.Object
sc2002.bto.entity.Application
public class Application extends Object
Represents a BTO housing application submitted by an applicant. Tracks the application status, selected flat type, and withdrawal requests.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Application(String applicationId, Applicant applicant, Project project, String applicationDate, FlatType selectedFlatType)
    Creates a new application with the specified details.

  • Constructor Details

    • Application

      public Application(String applicationId, Applicant applicant, Project project, String applicationDate, FlatType selectedFlatType)
      Creates a new application with the specified details. The default status is set to PENDING.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - Unique identifier for this application
      applicant - The applicant submitting the application
      project - The project being applied for
      applicationDate - The date of application submission
      selectedFlatType - The type of flat selected in this application

  • Method Details

    • getApplicationId

      public String getApplicationId()
      Gets the unique ID of this application.
      Returns:
      The application's unique identifier.

    • getApplicant

      public Applicant getApplicant()
      Gets the unique ID of this application.
      Returns:
      The application's unique identifier.

    • getProject

      public Project getProject()
      Gets the project associated with this application.
      Returns:
      The Project object for this application.

    • getApplicationDate

      public String getApplicationDate()
      Gets the date when this application was submitted.
      Returns:
      The application date as a string.

    • getStatus

      public ApplicationStatus getStatus()
      Gets the current status of this application.
      Returns:
      The current ApplicationStatus (PENDING, SUCCESSFUL, UNSUCCESSFUL, or BOOKED).

    • getSelectedFlatType

      public FlatType getSelectedFlatType()
      Gets the flat type selected in this application.
      Returns:
      The FlatType selected by the applicant.

    • setSelectedFlatType

      public void setSelectedFlatType(FlatType flatType)
      Updates the flat type for this application.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The new flat type to select.

    • requestWithdrawal

      public void requestWithdrawal()
      Requests a withdrawal of this application. The withdrawalRequested flag is set to true, but actual withdrawal requires approval from an HDB Manager.

    • isWithdrawalRequested

      public boolean isWithdrawalRequested()
      Checks if a withdrawal has been requested for this application.
      Returns:
      true if withdrawal has been requested, false otherwise

    • clearWithdrawalRequest

      public void clearWithdrawalRequest()
      Clears the withdrawal request flag for this application. Called after a withdrawal request has been processed.

    • updateStatus

      public void updateStatus(ApplicationStatus newStatus)
      Updates the status of this application.
      Parameters:
      newStatus - The new status to set for this application
